## Description
Implement unit tests for PaymentAdapterFactory with mock PayPal payment handler

## Reason for Delegation
Task requires testing of multiple payment types (Stripe, PayPal, Crypto) across PaymentAdapterFactory and its implementations, touching 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory, involving factory pattern, dependency injection, and test isolation. Total estimated LOC >400, multiple domains, and complex test setup.

- [ ] Task completed
- [ ] Tests pass
